attributes.action: Expand the A1 to a 6 lane motorway.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Expand the A1 both directions North & South to a 6 lane motorway between junctions 65 (Washington) and the A1/A69 Junction, everyone can agree this is the worst stretch of the A1 during rush hour, with a single accident on either side of the road, the whole stretch can grind to a halt.
